about_the_game:
Do your roguelite games not have enough memes? Want to fight your social media enemies in nailbiting emoji battles? Log in to the world of Meme Mayhem. Scroll the in-game feed, react to posts, and pick fights with celebrities. Slide into the DMs of characters like Pop Kat, Mars, and Sad Tadpole. Whether you're a selfless idealist or just looking for fortune and fame, you're on your way to the top of the social media food chain.

Features:


  • Fast-paced, strategic, and thrilling idle RPG combat.
  • A story with all the humor, sarcasm, and random cruelty of the real internet.
  • Deeply customizable abilities and attacks enable surprising and diverse builds.
  • 200+ perks and relics to discover!
  • Simulated social media feeds and DMs for engaging with NPCs to gain special rewards.

Swap emojis in high-stakes idle RPG action


Select perk rewards after each wave to build the perfect attack stack then watch as battles play out automatically. Deal damage by throwing Rocks, steal health with Vampire, catch your enemies on fire with Oil, and more. Snatch victory from the jaws of defeat by deploying a much-needed Ultimate moments before your health dwindles to zero! In the case of defeat, tailor your strategy to suit the challenge and try again!

Collect special perks and relics--and combine them for even more power


Each time you play, you'll select perks and relics that will customize your approach, each with unique advantages and disadvantages. Get an early advantage with Rush perks or use Emergency Heal to gain a late-game rescue. Between rounds of emoji battles, visit the Jezos shop to spend your gold on much-needed upgrades. And even combine relics to form special new ones like the Walking Octopus and Broccoli Devil.

Express yourself and gain rewards with in-game choice events


Red pill or blue pill? What color is The Dress? If a speeding trolley is hurtling towards either Mars or Lizardberg, who will you choose? Make your decisions and receive relic and stat rewards that will help (or hinder) your journey. Choice events add replayability (and chaos) to your quest!

Battle your way through the ranks of the internet


As your power grows, so does the size of your challenges and the status of your enemies. From a lowly troll to the biggest influencers and their armies of followers, fight your way through the ranks of social media users and take on internet icons in a darkly comic satire of politics and culture.

  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Hurl emojis and battle the internet's biggest stars to rise as a meme master in Meme Mayhem! Collect powerful perks and relics, enjoy a darkly comic social media story, and assemble the ultimate emoji attack stack in this roguelite idle RPG.
